room1.name: Hangar Bay
room1.description: The vast Hangar Bay feels deserted, with the silent spacecrafts adding to the eerie quietude of solitude.
room1.description2: Reentering the Hangar Bay, the smell of machinery and the sight of spacecrafts greet me again.

room2.name: Jail
room2.description: The Jail's quietness is more pronounced in solitude, its cold bars casting eerie shadows in the dim light.
room2.description2: The Jail's cold, barred confines feel just as unwelcoming as the first time.

room3.name: Bedroom
room3.description: The Bedroom's coziness contrasts starkly with the silence and solitude of the ship, offering a lonely respite.
room3.description2: Back in the Bedroom, its cozy ambiance and personal belongings provide a sense of comfort.

room4.name: Security
room4.description: In the deserted Security room, the idle monitors and absence of activity highlight the solitude.
room4.description2: The familiar buzz of monitors and the Security room's aura of vigilance envelope me once more.

room5.name: Control Room
room5.description: The Control Room, usually bustling, now feels unnervingly quiet and empty, emphasizing the loneliness.
room5.description2: Returning to the Control Room, the hum of high-tech equipment and strategic displays reignites a sense of command.

room6.name: Hallway Two
room6.description: Hallway Two's length is more noticeable in the quiet, with each step echoing in the deserted corridor.
room6.description2: Walking through Hallway Two again, its length and the sound of echoing footsteps bring a familiar rhythm.

room7.name: Hallway One
room7.description: The desolation in Hallway One is palpable, with the absence of people making it feel longer and more isolated.
room7.description2: Revisiting Hallway One, the walls still bear the marks and memories of past movements.

room8.name: Armory
room8.description: The Armory's stillness is profound, the weapons and armor standing silent watch in the absence of people.
room8.description2: The Armory, with its array of weapons and armor, feels just as formidable and secure as before.

room9.name: Sabotage
room9.description: The Sabotage Room feels more menacing in solitude, its tools for chaos lying in wait in the quiet.
room9.description2: Entering the Sabotage Room again, its air of secrecy and potential for chaos is palpable.

room10.name: Medbay
room10.description: In the empty Medbay, the usual bustle of care is replaced by a silent, sterile stillness, underscoring the solitude.
room10.description2: The Medbay, with its sterile scent and life-saving equipment, offers a reassuring sense of safety upon reentry.
